rename.from: Sporadic mock verification failures related to hashCode/equals on 3.12.0
rename.to: Sporadic mock verification failures related to hashCode/equals on 3.12.1

issue.title: Downgrade mockito-core from 3.12.1 to 3.11.2

labels.name: java
labels.description: Pull requests that update Java code

repository.name: gocd
repository.description: GoCD - Continuous Delivery server main repository

issue.body: We seem to be getting some strange instability on Mockito 3.12.0 and 3.12.1. Reverting to see if things stabilise or whether this is a red herring. https://github.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2399

body:
I have the same issue after upgrade from `3.11.2` to `3.12.1`, i.e. the mock is not equal to itself.
Here is an example of the recent failure in CI https://github.com/real-logic/agrona/runs/3401033492?check_suite_focus=true:
```

BroadcastReceiverTest > shouldReceiveTwoMessagesFromBuffer() FAILED
    java.lang.AssertionError: 
    Expected: is <Mock for UnsafeBuffer, hashCode: 0>
         but: was <Mock for UnsafeBuffer, hashCode: 0>
        at org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat(MatcherAssert.java:20)
        at org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat(MatcherAssert.java:6)
        at org.agrona.concurrent.broadcast.BroadcastReceiverTest.shouldReceiveTwoMessagesFromBuffer(BroadcastReceiverTest.java:131)
```

The issue is only reproducible in CI and only on Linux but is green locally or on Windows in CI.

Hm, the fallout of #2331 is indeed unfortunate. Apologies for the inconvenience.

Looking at the problems listed in this issue, the `HashSet` problem seems to me like it is working as intended. E.g. Mockito now correctly identifies a call on the mock (namely `.hashCode()`) and the code wasn't expecting that call to be there. I think it is fair to argue that the previous behavior was fine, but I think there is a reasonable argument to make that the new behavior is better.

With the second problem (that @vyazelenko also appears to run into), seems to be an issue with `Hamcrest` and `assertThat`. The issue is puzzling, as Mockito now correctly delegates any calls to `equals` to the mock. E.g. the real implementation of `equals` is called, which should be both safe (per the `Object` interface) and semantically more correct. I wonder if this might be an issue in Hamcrest itself (or at least the integration of both Hamcrest and Mockito).

While I think the new behavior is the way to go, especially in the `.hashCode()` situation, I think it is fair to introduce some way to ignore such calls. I wonder if we can add a setting on a mock that would say "you can call hashCode/equals and we don't mind" or something.

Would that be a workable solution for you?

Hm, wait. I just realized that both linked tests are using *mocks*, not *spies*. Then this behavior is unexpected and is a regression indeed. We should probably update the code from #2369 to only apply to *spies*.

Would one of you be willing to contribute a potential fix for this?

Aha. So the issue is that the second call breaks things. That's very unexpected. I presume that's happening because we are leaving some invalid state somewhere. However, from the code changes, it is not obvious as to how that could be the case. @raphw do you mind doing a post-commit review of https://github.com/mockito/mockito/commit/123beb8311ed6303ba71d682cff8434fe36b7f0f and see if we accidentally did something wrong there?

@TimvdLippe The problem is with the [org.mockito.internal.creation.bytebuddy.TypeCachingBytecodeGenerator#mockClass](https://github.com/mockito/mockito/blob/b04c7039031c170dae5f90acb3ec74c16289886f/src/main/java/org/mockito/internal/creation/bytebuddy/TypeCachingBytecodeGenerator.java#L42-L46) which **does not** include `defaultAnswer` when creating `MockitoMockKey`. Therefore both `spy` and `mock` end up using the same cached type and depending what is called first either of them becomes broken.

I'll add a PR to fix it.

Thanks for digging @vyazelenko - seems to explain the semantics I observe. After digging around, I believe the cases we had all had both spies and mocks created across different tests for the same class.
3.12.2 is currently being pushed to Maven Central and should be available in a couple of hours.

issue.title: Bump mockito-core from 3.11.2 to 3.12.3

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

issue.body:
Bumps [mockito-core](https://github.com/mockito/mockito) from 3.11.2 to 3.12.3.
Release notes

Sourced from [mockito-core's releases](https://github.com/mockito/mockito/releases).

v3.12.3

Changelog generated by [Shipkit Changelog Gradle Plugin](https://github.com/shipkit/shipkit-changelog)

3.12.3

  • 2021-08-24 - [9 commit(s)](https://github.com/mockito/mockito/compare/v3.12.2...v3.12.3) by Rafael Winterhalter
  • Fix implementation of proxy mock maker for toString and add additional unit tests. [([#2405](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2405))]([mockito/mockito#2405](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/pull/2405))
  • Avoid cache breakage [([#2402](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2402))]([mockito/mockito#2402](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/pull/2402))
  • Add a limited mock maker that is based only on the java.lang.reflect.Proxy utility [([#2397](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2397))]([mockito/mockito#2397](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/pull/2397))

v3.12.2

Changelog generated by [Shipkit Changelog Gradle Plugin](https://github.com/shipkit/shipkit-changelog)

3.12.2

  • 2021-08-24 - [2 commit(s)](https://github.com/mockito/mockito/compare/v3.12.1...v3.12.2) by Dmitry Vyazelenko, dependabot[bot]
  • Fixes [#2399](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2399) : Adds defaultAnswer to the MockitoMockKey to distinguish the mock types, i.e. to separate mocks from spies otherwise spy type is reused for a mock or vice versa. [([#2400](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2400))]([mockito/mockito#2400](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/pull/2400))
  • Sporadic mock verification failures related to hashCode/equals on 3.12.1 [([#2399](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2399))]([mockito/mockito#2399](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2399))
  • Bump versions.errorprone from 2.8.1 to 2.9.0 [([#2396](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2396))]([mockito/mockito#2396](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/pull/2396))

v3.12.1

Changelog generated by [Shipkit Changelog Gradle Plugin](https://github.com/shipkit/shipkit-changelog)

3.12.1

  • 2021-08-20 - [2 commit(s)](https://github.com/mockito/mockito/compare/v3.12.0...v3.12.1) by Tim van der Lippe, dependabot[bot]
  • Fix verifyNoMoreInteractions inOrder invocations for spies [([#2395](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2395))]([mockito/mockito#2395](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/pull/2395))
  • Regression with InOrder verification after [#2369](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2369) [([#2394](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2394))]([mockito/mockito#2394](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2394))
  • Bump versions.bytebuddy from 1.11.12 to 1.11.13 [([#2393](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2393))]([mockito/mockito#2393](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/pull/2393))

v3.12.0

Changelog generated by [Shipkit Changelog Gradle Plugin](https://github.com/shipkit/shipkit-changelog)

3.12.0

  • 2021-08-19 - [31 commit(s)](https://github.com/mockito/mockito/compare/v3.11.2...v3.12.0) by EugeneLesnov, Lars Vogel, Logan Rosen, Rafael Winterhalter, Rob Pridham, Tim van der Lippe, dependabot[bot], saurabh7248
  • Add checks for sealed types [([#2392](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2392))]([mockito/mockito#2392](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/pull/2392))
  • Bump versions.bytebuddy from 1.11.10 to 1.11.12 [([#2388](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2388))]([mockito/mockito#2388](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/pull/2388))
  • Bump versions.bytebuddy from 1.11.9 to 1.11.10 [([#2387](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2387))]([mockito/mockito#2387](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/pull/2387))
  • Bump versions.errorprone from 2.8.0 to 2.8.1 [([#2386](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2386))]([mockito/mockito#2386](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/pull/2386))
  • Update StaticMockTest to use unified verify method [([#2385](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2385))]([mockito/mockito#2385](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/pull/2385))
  • Reorder InjectMock Javadoc to fit the order of injection [([#2383](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2383))]([mockito/mockito#2383](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/pull/2383))
  • Bump core-ktx from 1.5.0 to 1.6.0 [([#2382](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2382))]([mockito/mockito#2382](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/pull/2382))
  • Bump google-java-format from 1.10.0 to 1.11.0 [([#2381](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2381))]([mockito/mockito#2381](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/pull/2381))
  • Downgrade Android gradle plugin [([#2380](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2380))]([mockito/mockito#2380](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/pull/2380))
  • Applied @CheckReturnValue to some classes [([#2379](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2379))]([mockito/mockito#2379](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/pull/2379))
  • how to solve gradle sync failed after 'Add basic Android instrumented and unit tests' [([#2378](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2378))]([mockito/mockito#2378](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2378))
  • Bump junit from 1.1.2 to 1.1.3 [([#2377](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2377))]([mockito/mockito#2377](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/pull/2377))
  • Bump appcompat from 1.3.0 to 1.3.1 [([#2376](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2376))]([mockito/mockito#2376](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/pull/2376))
  • Bump kotlin-gradle-plugin from 1.5.20 to 1.5.21 [([#2374](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2374))]([mockito/mockito#2374](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/pull/2374))
  • Bump material from 1.3.0 to 1.4.0 [([#2373](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2373))]([mockito/mockito#2373](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/pull/2373))
  • Bump espresso-core from 3.3.0 to 3.4.0 [([#2372](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2372))]([mockito/mockito#2372](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/pull/2372))
  • Fixes [#2331](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2331) [([#2369](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2369))]([mockito/mockito#2369](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/pull/2369))
  • Fix typo in exception [([#2368](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/issues/2368))]([mockito/mockito#2368](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/mockito/mockito/pull/2368))

... (truncated)

issue.title: Bump mockito-core from 3.11.2 to 3.12.3

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

repository.name: winry
repository.description: Isshoni Bootstrapper, uses introspection & code generation to streamline bootstrapping & general development

issue.body:
Bumps [mockito-core](https://github.com/mockito/mockito) from 3.11.2 to 3.12.3.
Release notes

Sourced from mockito-core's releases.

v3.12.3

Changelog generated by Shipkit Changelog Gradle Plugin

3.12.3

  • 2021-08-24 - 9 commit(s) by Rafael Winterhalter
  • Fix implementation of proxy mock maker for toString and add additional unit tests. [(#2405)](mockito/mockito#2405)
  • Avoid cache breakage [(#2402)](mockito/mockito#2402)
  • Add a limited mock maker that is based only on the java.lang.reflect.Proxy utility [(#2397)](mockito/mockito#2397)

v3.12.2

Changelog generated by Shipkit Changelog Gradle Plugin

3.12.2

  • 2021-08-24 - 2 commit(s) by Dmitry Vyazelenko, dependabot[bot]
  • Fixes #2399 : Adds defaultAnswer to the MockitoMockKey to distinguish the mock types, i.e. to separate mocks from spies otherwise spy type is reused for a mock or vice versa. [(#2400)](mockito/mockito#2400)
  • Sporadic mock verification failures related to hashCode/equals on 3.12.1 [(#2399)](mockito/mockito#2399)
  • Bump versions.errorprone from 2.8.1 to 2.9.0 [(#2396)](mockito/mockito#2396)

v3.12.1

Changelog generated by Shipkit Changelog Gradle Plugin

3.12.1

  • 2021-08-20 - 2 commit(s) by Tim van der Lippe, dependabot[bot]
  • Fix verifyNoMoreInteractions inOrder invocations for spies [(#2395)](mockito/mockito#2395)
  • Regression with InOrder verification after #2369 [(#2394)](mockito/mockito#2394)
  • Bump versions.bytebuddy from 1.11.12 to 1.11.13 [(#2393)](mockito/mockito#2393)

v3.12.0

Changelog generated by Shipkit Changelog Gradle Plugin

3.12.0

  • Update StaticMockTest to use unified verify method [(#2385)](mockito/mockito#2385)
  • Reorder InjectMock Javadoc to fit the order of injection [(#2383)](mockito/mockito#2383)
  • Bump core-ktx from 1.5.0 to 1.6.0 [(#2382)](mockito/mockito#2382)
  • Bump google-java-format from 1.10.0 to 1.11.0 [(#2381)](mockito/mockito#2381)
  • Downgrade Android gradle plugin [(#2380)](mockito/mockito#2380)
  • Applied @CheckReturnValue to some classes [(#2379)](mockito/mockito#2379)
  • how to solve gradle sync failed after 'Add basic Android instrumented and unit tests' [(#2378)](mockito/mockito#2378)
  • Bump junit from 1.1.2 to 1.1.3 [(#2377)](mockito/mockito#2377)
  • Bump appcompat from 1.3.0 to 1.3.1 [(#2376)](mockito/mockito#2376)
  • Bump kotlin-gradle-plugin from 1.5.20 to 1.5.21 [(#2374)](mockito/mockito#2374)
  • Bump material from 1.3.0 to 1.4.0 [(#2373)](mockito/mockito#2373)
  • Bump espresso-core from 3.3.0 to 3.4.0 [(#2372)](mockito/mockito#2372)
  • Fixes #2331 [(#2369)](mockito/mockito#2369)
  • Fix typo in exception [(#2368)](mockito/mockito#2368)

body: For anyone else who stumbles across this due to problems in their environments, it appears the changes in #2369  at the root of this breakage have been subsequently reverted in `3.12.3` based on PR #2402.
